page.title: 01 Village Sport.
page.content: Sport teams and clubs in the village imclude Cricket,Football,Darts,Dominoes and Skittles,the last three being attached to the various pubs and clubs in the village.The cricket teams play their home matches on the village playing field.There is a first team and a reserve team;the captain of the first eleven is Rodney Wickens and Nigel Wise is in charge of the reserves.The village has 4 football teams viz.Woodford 1st & 2nd and the Caped Crusaders 1st & 2nd.The latter's name came from a television programme called "Batman & Robin".They play their matches on the school pitch on Sunday mornings.The team is in the Daventry Sunday league.The team started as a joke,but they are doing well and were runners-up in the last 2 seasons.Andrew Worrall is player-manager of the 1sts. Rob Bailey & Andy Lovell are captains.
